page.title: 05The Royal Oak
page.content:
square again next year, though Mr. Appleby said he'd like a rest.
The pub in the square is called the{ {Royal Oak.} It's really a smalll hotel because it has a restaurant and rooms for people to stay. Mr.and Mrs. Smith have recently taken over the lease and the food is so good that this year it was voted the{Pub of the Year}by the Egon Ronay organisation, and everyone says that it's just a coincidence that Mr. Ronay lives only a mile away and uses it as his Local. It has'nt even got a public bar any more because when Mr. Behr was landlord he had the wall knocked down between the Lounge and the Public, so now a lot of people from the village go down the road to the{ Pot Kiln}in Frilsham. There's a garden for children and the entrance has tiles on
